headline: Kroger (KR) Navigates Thin Margins and Sluggish Industry Growth
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is included among the 14 Best Warren Buffett Dividend Stocks to Buy. A CNBC report published on February 5 noted that The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR)’s valuation remains relatively low, with the stock trading at 12.7x forward earnings. That is roughly half the multiple of the S&P 500, although it still ranks […]

headline: A Look At Kroger’s (KR) Valuation After Greg Foran’s Appointment As Chief Executive Officer
summary: Kroger (KR) is back in focus after the Board named Greg Foran as Chief Executive Officer and director on February 9, 2026, drawing fresh attention to the company’s leadership and stock. See our latest analysis for Kroger. The leadership announcement comes at a time when momentum has cooled in the very short term, with a 1-day share price return of 1.88% and a 7-day share price return of 6.86%. At the same time, the 30-day share price return of 3.28% and multi-year total shareholder returns of...
